name: True Colors
description:
It's a game where you have to solve a murder case, and you have to survive an artificial intelligence attack.

Murder
Player Mark Shreiner is on board as a researcher on a ship that will be lucky enough to arrive on Mars soon.
After three days of sleeping before work, Mark finds out about the murder on the ship.
Mark, who was freed from the suspect thanks to three days of drunk sleep, will investigate the murder.

After the murder
If we solve a murder, we need to stop artificial intelligence from hitting a ship on Mars with an unknown error.
Artificial intelligence has taken over the ship's system and attacked Mark, who is trying to sabotage himself.
Avoid humanoid attacks, inspect the ship to find a way to stop artificial intelligence. And block artificial intelligence and get to Mars safely before the ship hits Mars.
